name: church_stage_performance_mcp
description: A domain-knowledge MCP server providing structured, faith-aligned documentation on church stage performance, acting, singing, rehearsal, production, and ministry best practices.

docs.description: Primary knowledge resources including acting, singing, stagecraft, rehearsal, and ministry guidelines.

search.description: Search the documentation set for topics, definitions, and best practices.

define.description: Retrieve definitions of acting, singing, or stage terms by ID.

cross_reference.description: Find related topics based on 'related' field metadata in front matter.

security.notes: Designed for internal church and ministry training. Future versions may enable authenticated access for distributed church networks.

instructions: 1. Place this manifest.json and schema.yaml in the repository root.
2. Ensure all documentation files exist under ./docs with proper YAML front matter.
3. Run your MCP server pointing to this manifest file.
4. Connect your AI agent or app using the MCP client configuration referencing this repository path.
